resources.string: Game will not be saved! Proceed?

Always drink responsibly!

Remember the real reason you had fun!

Good luck, have fun!

Rules:

Ace, Waterfall
2, Give 2 sips
3, Drink 3 sips
4, Hitler
5, 123
6, Women drink 3 sips
7, Category
8, Rule
9, Everybody drinks 3 sips
10, Men drink 3 sips
11, Skip-card
12, Hoe
13, Kingdrink!

Tap card to draw!
Hitler\n\nLast one to stand up and shout "Hitler!", drinks 3 sips. Probably you since you are still reading this!
123!\n\nThe one who drew the card drinks 1, next one 2, next one 3 etc…
Women drink!\n\nAll the women drink 3 sips!

Category\n\nPlayer who drew card tells category and first example. Next player must say new instance of that category. Failing to come up with new, results to 3 sips penalty. (Played until someone fails)
Rule!\n\nMake new rule for the game! Rule stays in place until next rule (or you decide, it\'s your rule anyway)
Men drink!\n\nAll the men drink 3 sips
Skip-Task!\n\nWohoo! This is the "Skip-Task"-card! Unfortunately it doesn\'t allow you to skip actual tasks, but feel free to skip next few sips you should otherwise take!
Hoe!\n\nMake a hoe out of friend! Person you choose, has to drink always when you drink (related to game). To seal the deal, both of you take 2 sips now! (That makes it 4 to your hoe ;) )

KingDrink

THE Drink! 
Pour few sips of your drink to glass. The player mentioned at the screen does the same and drinks it!

Make a hoe out of friend!

Person you choose, has to drink always when you drink (related to game).

To seal the deal, both of you take 2 sips now! (That makes it already 4 to your hoe ;) )

Together as group, come up with a challenge and create an epic battle against sexes!

You may choose if the whole team participates or just one on one or something else.

Losers take shots!
(Thirsty winners may also take ones)
Truth: Other players asks something and
to do a task they choose.
Other players ask "would you rather" question from

Pour three shots.

One contains alcohol, other two doesn't.

Example: 1 shot of vodka, two shots of water.
chooses one blindfolded and drinks it. No smelling it! Just drink ;)

Think of two true events from your life or things about you and one lie.

Other players may ask questions about those claims.

Finally everybody tries to guess which one is the lie.

Wrong guess gets rewarded with 5 sips!

Succeeding to fool everybody results +3 steps to your next dice!
You will be presented "Failure" and "+3" buttons at board view visible at your turns to click before throwing the dice when completed this task.

Game can continue until you are ready with claims,
but there is 3 sips penalty every round to you until you complete this task.

Choose partner for this task

Explain words presented here before timer runs out

You can explain the last word after the time has run out

You may not use any part of the word itself

You may skip words with the skip button (penalty 0,5)

Good luck!
Time\'s up!\n\nGive sips same amount as your score!
, take this device to your hands for the duration of this task!\n
Touch the card to peek it\n

After first guess, you have to tell if your card is higher or lower (or if it's correct).

If the first guess is right you have to take 5 sips

Same player takes a second guess

You show everybody the card

If the card is right, you take 3 sips, if wrong the one who guessed, takes 3 sips

Change card and repeat to all players

Welcome to THE Track!

Place your bets everybody and get ready for some track fun!

Everyone places some sips bet to one Ace of their choose respectively.

When next card is drawn the ace with same suit as drawn proceeds at track.

All players whose horse is behind leader has to drink their bet at every turn.

When last coming horse reaches step. The card at side is turn and ace with same suit as turned card has to go back one step.

Those whose horse (Ace) crosses the finish line first gets to give their bet x 10 to others!

Tap the deck for first card after starting the race and declaring your bet to draw a card and drawn card to proceed after turns!
The Ace of Hearts Wins!\n\nGive your bet x 10!
The Ace of Spades Wins!\n\nGive your bet x 10!
The Ace of Diamonds Wins!\n\nGive your bet x 10!
The Ace of Clubs Wins!\n\nGive your bet x 10!

There is no getting out of this bus until the end of line!

Guess if the next card is lower or higher!

If you make wrong guess you get 3 sips penalty and start again!

You got 4 tries.

Good Luck!
You ain\'t in any condition to drive!
Make a pile out of you!
In large games not everybody has to go to pile!\n\nBe safe and don\'t be stupid!
